content: river bluffs sock series furrow river bluffs socks for keeping warm in the river valley or on the blufftop yarn 100 gm approx 400 yards of fingering weight sock yarn needles size us 1 2 25 mm or appropriate size to obtain gauge in your preferred style short 9 circular dpns long circs for magic loop etc note this pattern will not provide instructions for any particular needle configuration size m l to fit 8 inch 9 inch foot circumference gauge 8 stitches = 1 inch in stockinette stitch by heather asbeck garter stitch ridges mimic undulating row in a fresh-furrowed field sleek smooth circular needles cuff slither through stitches co cast on 62 70 stitches loops of yarn entwined join yarn place marker and begin knitting in the round being careful about them like vines shrewdly not to twist stitches the tiny sharp tips flick work twisted 1x1 twisted ribbing knit 1 tbl p1 repeat to end of round in and out of the spiraled yarn for 15 rounds like the tongue of a garden snake leg catching and grabbing set up rounds the wool undulating round 1 k1 tbl twisted k1 not twisted repeat to end of round this through serpentine row should extend the columns of twisted knit stitches for another round charming my fingers while knitting the stitches in the purl columns normally round 2 knit round 3 size m k5 p21 k to end of round size l k6 p23 k to end of round want to share your in-progress or finished socks on social media tag your pics with #riverbluffssocks or #furrowsocks ©2017 by heather asbeck for personal use only pattern may not be sold reproduced or distributed without permission 12 river bluffs sock series furrow by heather asbeck heel turn row 1 rs slip 1 k15 17 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws slip 1 p4 p2tog p1 turn note there will be a small gap between working stitches that form the heel turn and unworked stitches row 3 rs sl1 knit to within 1 stitch of gap ssk k1 turn row 4 ws sl1 purl to within 1 stitch of gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 & 4 increasing one additional knit or purl stitch after the slip 1 until all side stitches are worked end with completed rs row proceed to gusset gusset when you have completed the heel turn resume knitting leg cont in the round as follows pick up and knit 1 stitch between each garter ridge along the heel flap plus 1 extra stitch m1r between the gusset and instep stitches to close up after the set-up rounds continue as follows in a 3-round any gap place marker modified garter stitch pattern until leg measures 7 or desired length from cast on knit across instep stitches maintaining the modified garter furrow pattern across the top of the foot if you round 1 knit ended with round 3 you should now be back at round 1 place marker
